Package org.xmlcml.cml.base

Interface Summary
CMLConstants Constants
 

Class Summary
BooleanArrayAttribute attribute representing a boolean value..
BooleanAttribute attribute representing an boolean value.
CMLAttribute generic subclassed Attribute for CML elements.
CMLElement schema-derived atom class
CMLElements<E extends Element> class to manage child elements in similar manner to XOM Elements.
CMLLog generic logfile for CML activities
CMLNamespace manages CML namespaces.
CMLSerializer Serializer for customising CML output
CMLType supports XSD and derived types generated by software and only instantiated as singletons
CMLUtil static utilities to help manage common constructs.

StringArrayAttribute attribute representing an array of Strings.
